entity.name: publication
entity.query: SELECT p.id, p.current_version_id, pv.title, pv.alt_title, pv.isbn, pv.issn, pv.eissn, pv.article_number FROM publications p LEFT JOIN publication_versions pv ON pv.id = p.current_version_id WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.published_at IS NOT NULL

entity.name: people
entity.query: SELECT p.id AS person_id, p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS author_full_name, i1.value AS author_xaccount, i2.value AS author_orcid FROM people p JOIN people2publications p2p ON p2p.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN identifiers i1 ON p.id = i1.person_id AND i1.source_id = (SELECT id FROM sources WHERE name = 'xkonto'::text) LEFT JOIN identifiers i2 ON p.id = i2.person_id AND i2.source_id = (SELECT id FROM sources WHERE name = 'orcid'::text) WHERE p2p.publication_version_id = '${publication.current_version_id}'

entity.name: identifiers
entity.query: SELECT pi.id AS id, pi.identifier_value AS publication_identifier FROM publication_identifiers pi JOIN publication_versions pv ON pv.id = pi.publication_version_id WHERE pv.id = '${publication.current_version_id}'
